content: Hmm, I think that @tmandry is not available, and I also have a last minute conflict coming up today.
Can we move this meeting to async?
I'm going to briefly go over the triage

nikomatsakis said:

Can we move this meeting to async?

?

As far as the vision doc goes, I think the big next step is continued iteration on the "shiny future". I posted some thoughts in #wg-async-foundations > Harmonic synthesis and I'd probably want to keep the conversation there. I would like to hear more feedback about the "experience-driven story" -- I should probably try to take it from outline to something more narrative. I'm trying to see how specific I can get it. I'm also thinking about dumping thoughts in various design documents (e.g., the considerations around async-drop and other technical questions).
I just meant @Doc Jones that folks can jump in on this topic with thoughts if desired :)

nikomatsakis said:

I just meant Doc Jones that folks can jump in on this topic with thoughts if desired :)

Thanks. I thought maybe there was another stream some place. :-)
